string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Chain_EreshDrakan_Pr_80_An
string.body: Special Mage[pl:"Mages"] of the 39th Spy Squad;A Special Mage of the Prigga Legion's Spy Squad, who is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Chain_EreshDrakan_All
string.body: Special Force[pl:"Forces"] of the 39th Spy Squad;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Chain_EreshDrakan_Fi_80_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Chain_EreshDrakan_Ra_80_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Chain_EreshDrakan_As_80_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Chain_EreshDrakan_Wi_80_An] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Chain_EreshDrakan_Pr_80_An] who are stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E2] for a specified period before the fortress can be occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_1521_Miston_Guard_Dr_Q62657
string.body: Balaur Strike Troop of Lakrum Fortress;A Balaur Strike Troop which appears when Lakrum Fortress is occupied by the Balaur and can be recaptured.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_1521_Miston_Guard_Da_Q62658
string.body: Asmodian Strike Troop of Lakrum Fortress;An Asmodian Strike Troop which appears when Lakrum Fortress is occupied by the Asmodians and can be recaptured.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_1521_Miston_Guard_Li_Q72658
string.body: Elyos Strike Troop of Lakrum Fortress;An Elyos Strike Troop which appears when Lakrum Fortress is occupied by the Elyos and can be recaptured.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF5_F_MissionVritra_All
string.body: Nazra Defence Troop[pl:"Troops"];This troop includes the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_MissionVritra_Fi_61_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_MissionVritra_As_61_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_MissionVritra_Wi_61_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1_StoryBook_1
string.body: Guide[pl:"Guides"] to Rare Poisons;Nobody knows who authored this book. It describes the day of the Cataclysm in great detail.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLC1_Dreadgion_Ship_L
string.body: Rumenes;A Guardian Fleet which is linked to the Rift in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDLC1_Dreadgion_Gigieda]. You can board the ship via a Teleport Protector at the centre of Elyos Square.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLC1_Dreadgion_Gigieda
string.body: Gieda Dredgion;The Dredgion of the Gieda Legion which appears in the sky above the city.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLC1_Dreadgion_Ship_D
string.body: Ladius;An Archon Fleet that is connected to the Rift of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDLC1_Dreadgion_Gigieda]. You can board the ship via a Teleport Protector in the centre.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Weatha_E
string.body: Weda;Agent of Lady Ariel. She came to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7] on a mission from Ariel to assist the Agent of Lady Yustiel. She is presently stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Ilisia_E
string.body: Ilisia;Heavenly Lights Brigade General. She is assisting Agent [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Weatha_E] and is on a mission. She is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Feregran_E
string.body: Peregran;Agent of Lord Azphel. He came to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7] on a mission from Azphel to assist the Agent of Lady Lumiel. He is presently stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Reinhard_E
string.body: Renard;Shadowbringer Brigade General. He is assisting Agent [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Feregran_E] and is on a mission. He is stationed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Mission_Marker_60
string.body: Campaign;An important quest which you can obtain by talking to the NPC highlighted in yellow. The location of the quest is shown on the World Map (M) and the Transparent Overlay (N).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Important_Marker_60
string.body: Region Quests;You can obtain these quests by talking to the NPC highlighted in blue. The location of the quest is shown on the World Map (M) and the Transparent Overlay (N).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Seen_Marker_60
string.body: Normal Quest;A quest which you can obtain by talking to the NPC highlighted in sky-blue. The location of the quest is shown on the World Map (M) and the Transparent Overlay (N).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DIE_Cheska
string.body: Cheska;She died when the Elyos attacked Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF5_Magic_Circle
string.body: Lumiel's Magic Ward[pl:"Wards"];A Magic Ward which Lady Lumiel created in Vengar to locate Dragon Lady Ereshkigal. Connects Vengar with Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_EnterObj_D
string.body: Studio Entrance;You can find the entrance to the studios that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Sarrik] manages in Sierra State, north of Zephyr Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDAbRe_Core_L_01_In
string.body: Mirash Refuge Entrance;An entrance at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF7_SZ_B1] in Lakrum, which leads to the Mirash Refuge.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDAbRe_Core_D_01_In
string.body: Mirash Refuge Entrance;An entrance at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF7_SZ_B1] in Lakrum, which leads to the Mirash Refuge.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Quest_Q62580
string.body: Targets in West Lakrum;[plur]They include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B_WoollyBear_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B_Noctiluca_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C_ChameleonMan_78_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C_Stingray_78_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C_Noctiluca_78_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Quest_Q62581
string.body: Targets in North-West Lakrum;They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_WoodenGigant_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_SadoFighter_Ruins_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_Nepilim_Dyn_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_Valak_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_PigNight_80_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_ElephantBirdRe_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Quest_Q62582
string.body: Targets in the Temple of Endorim;They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_NeutFly_Ruins_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_ElephantBird_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Zaif_Plant_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Sam_Ruin_80_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Dionaea_White_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Quest_Q62583
string.body: Targets at the Cruel Coastline;They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_SeaMonster_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_Fishman_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_SharkAssassinRe_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_PirateZombie_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_PirateZombieRe_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_LizardmanFighter_Bone_80_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_Worm_Blue_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Quest_Q72580
string.body: Targets in East Lakrum;They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B2_CrocodileMan_77_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B2_SeaMonster_Forest_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C2_Wildboar_78_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C2_CrowMan_78_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C2_DemonShadow_78_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Quest_Q72581
string.body: Targets in North-West Lakrum;They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_PigNight_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_Fox_NightRe_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_ElephantBird_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_Valak_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_PigNight_80_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_ElephantBirdRe_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Cuberin_Shugo_Soldier_All
string.body: Kubrinerk's Shugo Mercenaries;They fled to Lakrum with Kubrinerk when the Shulacks attacked and captured Kubrinerk's Cube Laboratory. They include [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Zikirunrun], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Dodoring] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Mozirung].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Zikirunrun
string.body: Teidirunerk;One of Kubrinerk's Shugo Mercenaries. Fleeing to Lakrum from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G], he was pursued by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_CubicQuest_PirateZombie_80_An]. He has since vanished without a trace.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Dodoring
string.body: Eisirunerk;One of Kubrinerk's Shugo Mercenaries. Fleeing to Lakrum from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F], he was pursued by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_CubicQuest_Zaif_Plant_80_An]. He has since vanished.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Mozirung
string.body: Wirrunerk;One of Kubrinerk's Shugo Mercenaries. Fleeing to Lakrum from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F], he was pursued by [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_CubicQuest_Shellizard_80_An]. He has been missing ever since.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Madrukin_Shulack_All
string.body: Malarkin Defence Troop;A Shulack Defence Troop belonging to Malarkin's followers. It has occupied Kubrinerk's Cube Laboratory. Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_02], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_03] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62810_L
string.body: Senekta;This ancient refuge harbours the sacred treasure of the Jotun. You can enter it via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_Entrance_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62810_D
string.body: Senekta;This ancient refuge harbours the sacred treasure of the Jotun. You can enter it via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_Entrance_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_Halidom_of_Aion
string.body: Aion's Relic;A sacred relic imbued with Aion's Power of Creation. It is allegedly kept in the depths of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_Entrance_L
string.body: Senekta Entrance[pl:"Entrances"];The entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62810_L]. Can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A] in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_Entrance_D
string.body: Senekta Entrance[pl:"Entrances"];The entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_SensoryArea_Q62810_D]. Can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A] in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_Penalty_Entrance_L
string.body: Secret Senekta Entrance;The entrance to the underground refuge in Lakrum. It appears at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP3] when the Asmodians occupy Lakrum Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF7_Ere_Penalty_Entrance_D
string.body: Secret Senekta Entrance;The entrance to the underground refuge in Lakrum. It appears at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP3] when the Elyos occupy Lakrum Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_01
string.body: Antrum the Messenger;A messenger of the Katakumba tribe who worship power. You can find these Mosbears with branching antlers in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A2], at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C2] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_02
string.body: Dighum the Messenger;A messenger of the Rosebush Brohums who pray for peace in Atreia. The creature's body is concealed by a bush. You can find it in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1], in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_002] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C4] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_03
string.body: Taudon the Messenger;A messenger of the Koinum Calydon who are forever at war. He was seen swinging a mighty axe in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7], at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D9] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_04
string.body: Teshinan the Messenger;A messenger of the Perum tribe, which hides within a deep a cave. You can find this rock-like Tesinon in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_F1] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_05
string.body: Poroto the Messenger;A messenger of the pure Spiritfall Forest Popoku. He is clothed in leaves. You can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E1], in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E3] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Pandora_Shugo_01
string.body: Mendorinerk;A Shugo who is hiding his identity. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A4] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Pandora_Deva_01
string.body: Allis;Wears the attire of the Inggison Guardians and appears at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B4] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B9] and in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B5] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Pandora_Shugo_02
string.body: Sitarunerk;A Shugo who is hiding his identity. Found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C3], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C2] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C1] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Pandora_Deva_02
string.body: Arius;Wears the attire of the Inggison Guardians and appears at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B3], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B2] and in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B1] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Pandora_Shugo_03
string.body: Superinerk;A Shugo who is hiding his identity. Found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A1], in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A2] and in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A3] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_01
string.body: Lunka the Messenger;A messenger of the Katakumba tribe who worship power. You can find these Mosbears with branching antlers on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C2] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_02
string.body: Serhum the Messenger;A messenger of the Rosebush Brohums who pray for peace in Atreia. The creature's body is concealed by a bush. You can find it in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C3] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_C5] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_03
string.body: Kudson the Messenger;A messenger of the Koinum Calydon who are forever at war. He was seen swinging a mighty axe in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D1], at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D3] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_D4] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_04
string.body: Teson the Messenger;A messenger of the Perum tribe, which hides within a deep a cave. You can find this rocklike Tesinon in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G4] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G3] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_05
string.body: Ponosso the Messenger;A messenger of the pure Spiritfall Forest Popoku. He is clothed in leaves. You can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6], at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G5] and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF3_Village_02] in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF3_name].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Pandora_Shugo_01
string.body: Mendorunerk;A Shugo who is hiding his identity. He appears on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A1] and on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A5] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4].

string.body: Inke;Wears the attire of the Gelkmaros Archons and appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B4], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B5] and in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B6] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4].

string.body: Cheltus;Wears the attire of the Gelkmaros Archons and appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B1], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B2] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B3] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4].

string.body: Superunerk;A Shugo who is hiding his identity. He appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A6] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_HR
string.body: Pandora Recruitment Office;An association which prefers hard work over honourable sacrifice and promises fair payment for the same.

string.body: Cursed Elyos Daeva Souls;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF3F3_UndeadLightWi] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF3F3_UndeadLightPr].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_A5_Shulack_All
string.body: Shulack Elite Soldiers;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackKn_51_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackAs], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackFi], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackPr], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackWi_51_Ae] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackRa].

string.body: Hanarkand Elite Soldiers;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanAs_noble], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanAs_vil], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanFi_noble], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanFi_vil], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanRa_noble], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanRa_vil], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanWi_noble] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanWi_vil].

string.body: Alukina Palace Seiren;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_FlyingSeirenReD], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_SeirenBreederD], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_SeirenD] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_SeirenReD].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Owllau_All

string.body: Settlement Reward Chest[pl:"Chests"];Follow the Pandora Settlement Path, enter the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_PvE] and successfully complete the Project Office tasks to receive the chest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Village01_Boss
string.body: Black Fins Legates;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_LF5_v01_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_LF5_v02_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_LF5_v03_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_LF5_v04_Boss] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_LF5_v05_Boss]. Follow the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Portal_PvP] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P1_01] to find them.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Village02_Boss
string.body: Nazra Legates;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_DF5_v01_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_DF5_v02_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_DF5_v03_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_DF5_v04_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_DF5_v05_Boss], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_DF5_v06_Boss] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_DF5_v07_Boss]. Follow the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Portal_PvP] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_P2_01] to find them.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Portal_PvP
string.body: Pandora Battlefield Path;At a certain time, the Elyos path will appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and the Asmodian path will appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Portal_PvE
string.body: Pandora Settlement Path;At a certain time, the Elyos path will appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and the Asmodian path will appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Defence01_Boss
string.body: Mist-Thorn Chieftains;They include the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_PandoraRaid_SpiderQueen] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_PandoraRaid_SkeletonKing] who ambushed the resource transport of the Pandora Projects Office.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Defence02_Boss
string.body: Ruins Chieftains;They include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_PandoraRaid_SandWorm], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_PandoraRaid_Agrint_Coral] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PandoraRaid_PandoraRaid_Chimera] who ambushed the resource transport of the Pandora Projects Office.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Defence01_Energy
string.body: Mist-Thorn Resource Transport[pl:"Transports"];A Pandora Projects Office transport carrying resources fresh from the Mist-Thorn Forest. Resource extraction has enraged the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Defence01_Boss].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Defence02_Energy
string.body: Ruins Resource Transport[pl:"Transports"];A Pandora Projects Office transport carrying resources fresh from the Jotun Ruins. Resource extraction has enraged the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Pandora_Raid_Defence02_Boss].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_NPC_01
string.body: Snoopinerk;An inspector who appeared after the Glowing Meteorite in Lakrum. Elyos can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and Asmodians can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_NPC_02
string.body: Glowing Meteorite[pl:"Meteorites"];A meteorite that struck Lakrum. You can smash it with an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Item_Cash].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Dungeon
string.body: Secret Hellpath;An underground path created during a meteor shower in Lakrum. You can set off on it with help from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_NPC_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Hunt_01
string.body: Cursed Daeva's Soul[pl:"Souls"];A Daeva's soul that appears on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Dungeon].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Hunt_02
string.body: Woodush's Vicious Energy;You will find it once you defeat Corpsewaker Woodush on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Dungeon].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Item_Cash
string.body: [Rune] Orichalcon Hammer[pl:"Hammers"];The only tool you can use to smash a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_NPC_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Item_Box
string.body: Glowing Meteorite Bundle[pl:"Bundles"];Destroy a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_NPC_02] with an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Item_Cash], to receive the bundle.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Item_Quest
string.body: Investigation Report[pl:"Reports"] about the Secret Hellpath;You receive it when you take the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v65_Dungeon].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Normal_Li_01
string.body: Eilinerk the Arrested;Appears with a certain probability in the Lakrum Garrison when it is conquered by the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Normal_Li_02
string.body: Eilinerk the Escaped;Appears when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Normal_Li_01] frees himself from captivity.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Unique_Li_01
string.body: Flinkinerk the Inmate;Appears with a certain probability in the Lakrum Garrison when it is conquered by the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Unique_Li_02
string.body: Flinkinerk The Escaped;Appears when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Unique_Li_01] frees herself from captivity.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Normal_Da_01
string.body: Eilinerk the Overpowered;Appears with a certain probability in the Lakrum Garrison when it is conquered by the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Normal_Da_02
string.body: Eilinerk the Escapee;Appears when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Normal_Da_01] frees himself from captivity.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Unique_Da_01
string.body: Flinkinerk the Imprisoned;Appears with a certain probability in the Lakrum Garrison when it is conquered by the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Unique_Da_02
string.body: Flinkinerk The Fled;Appears when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Sep_Event_NPC_Unique_Da_01] frees herself from captivity.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_NPC_L_Shugo_Gamsalung_E
string.body: Patron Heart Dankinerk;A Shugo who leads the autumn harvest representatives. Can be found in the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_NPC_D_Shugo_Gamsalung_E
string.body: Grinning Cheek Dankinerk;A Shugo who leads the autumn harvest representatives. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_PC_BRICK_COIN_01
string.body: [Event] Pixel Friendship Coin;A [%dic:STR_DIC_W_PC_room] where registration is required to receive this special coin.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_Change_Buff_v65_Pixel_M
string.body: Pixel Friend[pl:"Friends"] of the Quests;Elyos can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and Asmodians will find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_AION_Event_DeathKnight_Horror_80_Al
string.body: Phantonicht;A ghost who wasn't invited to the wedding. He trampled the wedding cake with his hooves.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_OP_Halloween_L_E
string.body: Little Ghost;Making preparations for the wedding of Phobiye and Philiye. Can be found in the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_OP_Halloween_D_E
string.body: Little Ghost;Making preparations for the wedding of Phobiye and Philiye. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Halloween_Key_Ghost
string.body: Crazy Little Ghost;The ghost child got lost and appears at fixed intervals in the 127th, 128th, or 129th Garrison in[%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Halloween_Key
string.body: Ghost Key[pl:"Keys"];Appears in the secret location at fixed intervals. It can be used to open secret chests. It vanishes into thin air again if it is not used within a short period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_AION_Event_Beholder_L_80_n
string.body: Kako;A pesky ghost. Once he has been defeated, you will receive a useful effect for the battle against Phantonicht.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_AION_Event_Beholder_D_80_n
string.body: Kiko;A pesky ghost. Once he has been defeated, you will receive a useful effect for the battle against Phantonicht.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_B_D3_Lega_L_All
string.body: Headquarters Squadron;A Drakan Protectorate horde that protects the headquarters from external attacks as part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] fighting force. They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_MB_D3_Lega_Fi_80_Ae], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_MB_D3_Lega_Wi_80_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_B3_M_Lega_L_Fi_80_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_L_All
string.body: Bemnu's Tribe;A Snuwa tribe that follows Chieftain Bemnu. It includes the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_L_Fi_80_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_L_Ra_80_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_L_Pr_80_An] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_L_Wi_80_An]. He has set up camp in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_B_D3_Lega_D_All
string.body: Headquarters Militia;A Drakan Protectorate horde that protects the headquarters from external attacks as part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] fighting force. They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_MB_D3_Lega_Fi_80_Ae], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_MB_D3_Lega_Wi_80_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_B3_M_Lega_D_Fi_80_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_D_All
string.body: Amnu's Tribe;A Snuwa tribe that follows Chieftain Amnu. It includes the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_D_Fi_80_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_D_Ra_80_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_D_Pr_80_An] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_E_M_Snoowa_D_Wi_80_An]. He has set up camp in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_D_Mission].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_Mission01_Lega_All
string.body: Rega Headquarters Drakans;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_Fi_80_Ae], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_As_80_Ae], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_Wi_80_Ae], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_Pr_80_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_named_80_Ae]. They can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_Mission02_Lega_All
string.body: Vishaka's Defence Troop;This troop left Rega Headquarters and joined Vishaka. It consists of [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Fi01_80_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Ra01_80_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Wi01_80_An]. Is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_Mission01_Lega_Normal_All
string.body: Rega Headquarters Guard Troop;They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_Fi_80_Ae], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_As_80_Ae], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_Wi_80_Ae], and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Mission01_D3_Lega_Pr_80_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_SZ_F_L_M_Sub_L_80
string.body: Mob Elyos (not in use);Were abused by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission] as test subjects for Stella human experiments and mutated into fearsome creatures. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_F_M_Zombie_L_80_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_F_M_Skeleton_L_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_SZ_F_D_M_Sub_D_80
string.body: Mob Asmodians (not in use);Were abused by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission] as test subjects for Stella human experiments and mutated into fearsome creatures. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_F_M_Zombie_D_80_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_F_M_Skeleton_D_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Pandora_All
string.body: Pandora;An umbrella term for the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Pandora_HR] and the Pandora Projects Office. It turns out that Pandora is a subsidiary of the Stella Corporation.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry
string.body: Stella Corporation;A company that started out in the raw materials industry and suddenly became a large corporation with the development of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6]. Lots of departments and branches are united under one roof, which is why the Stella Corporation is also called the Stella Group or [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella] for short. Employs staff from all factions and pays them for their performance, which has earned the company a good reputation.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Stella
string.body: Stella;Abbreviation of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rega
string.body: Rega;A new Balaur association in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Tiamat's death caused the Balaur immediately under her command to flee. They settled in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] and emerged there as a new Rega power there.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Naki6
string.body: NK-VI;Nakisix. The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] would not exist if it weren't for this product. Consuming it radically improves your physical ability for a while.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Naki6_K
string.body: Nakisix;This is how [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6], the Stella Corporation's super-product, is pronounced. The meaning seems clear yet enigmatic: 'the sixth Naki'.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Tiamat_Crown
string.body: Tiamat's Crown;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega]ringleader [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al] stole this unique item from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy] and disappeared with it. The power of Dragon Lord Tiamat smoulders within it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy
string.body: Dragon Lord Legacy;The legacy of the Dragon Lords. These are relics that still retain the power of the Dragon Lords. They include buildings and statues.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Snuwa
string.body: Snuwa;Sapiens who populate [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] and have worshipped [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Apsu] since time immemorial. They firmly believe that the Dragon Lord [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Apsu] will be resurrected one day. They are at war with the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] over the Apsu Altars.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Helper_Manutt
string.body: Witness;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_G1_Manutt_E]. He was thought to have disappeared but has now turned up in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Helper_Anuk
string.body: Helper;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_G2_Anuk_E]. He was thought to have disappeared but has now turned up in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_OBJ_IDF8_Mission03_Step4
string.body: Chest[pl:"Chests"] of the Balaur Legacy;A chest kept in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step4]. It contains locked-up relics of past Dragon Lords in rank and file.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Quest_Q81048_A
string.body: Northern Lakrum Creatures;Includes [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_WoodenGigant_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_SadoFighter_Ruins_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_Nepilim_Dyn_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_NeutFly_Ruins_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_HolyMushroom_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_PigNight_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_Fox_NightRe_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_ElephantBird_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_Wildboar_79_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_HolyMushroom_79_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Quest_Q81048_B
string.body: Central Lakrum Creatures;Includes [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_ElephantBirdRe_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_Octaside_Dark_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_IronTurtle_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_IronTurtleBaby_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_NeutFly_Ruins_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_ElephantBird_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Zaif_Plant_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Sam_Ruin_80_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Dionaea_White_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Quest_Q81049_A
string.body: Northern Lakrum Creatures;Includes [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_WoodenGigant_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_SadoFighter_Ruins_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_Nepilim_Dyn_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_NeutFly_Ruins_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_HolyMushroom_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_PigNight_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_Fox_NightRe_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_ElephantBird_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_Wildboar_79_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_HolyMushroom_79_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Quest_Q81049_B
string.body: Central Lakrum Creatures;Includes [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_ElephantBirdRe_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_Octaside_Dark_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_IronTurtle_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_IronTurtleBaby_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_NeutFly_Ruins_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_ElephantBird_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Zaif_Plant_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Sam_Ruin_80_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Dionaea_White_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF4Re_Dra_Boss_All
string.body: Esoterrace Spook;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_03_DrakanNamed_55_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_03_DrakanNamedFail_55_Ah] are up to their ghostly tricks under this name.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Sbase
string.body: Ara Buchloe;Apsu altars in Dumaha's Northern Plains Region. They include the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5021], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5022] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5025].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Mbase
string.body: Ara Hammada;Apsu altars in the desert zone of Central Dumaha. They include the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5023], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5026], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5028], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5029] and the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5031].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Lbase
string.body: Ara Vulcana;Apsu altars in Dumaha's southern volcanic region. They include the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5024], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5027], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5030] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5032].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Sbase_Mistoff_Guard_Sw_All
string.body: Snuwa Buchloe Conquest Squad;A Snuwa Conquest Squad that has occupied the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Sbase]. It appears when neither the Elyos nor the Asmodians have captured the altar.

string.body: Rega Drakan[pl:"Drakans"];A Rega Drakan from Tiamat's surviving forces. He occupies the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_E_D3_Snoowa_All
string.body: Wasteland Snuwa;A Sapiens people who worship the former Dragon Lord Apsu. They live in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_G_D3_All
string.body: Outlaw[pl:"Outlaws"];An outlaw who has succumbed to the evil intoxicating effect of Nakisix. He is mooching around in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_K_D3_Lega_All
string.body: Rega Special Drakan[pl:"Drakans"];A Rega Special Drakan from Tiamat's surviving forces. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_SZ_AB_All
string.body: Dumaha Prairie;A plains region with perennial vegetation, where grasses and trees flourish. Is located in Northern Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_SZ_CDEHIJ_All
string.body: Dumaha Rocky Desert;A desert region where there has been extensive and dramatic physical weathering. Is located in Central and Southern Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_SZ_G_All
string.body: Dumaha No-Man's Land;An outlaw region teeming with criminals. Can be found in Western Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_SZ_F_All
string.body: Dumaha Sand Flows;Huge masses of sand with bottomless depths float around this area and provide a dynamic boost for flying. Can be found in Central Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_SZ_K_All
string.body: Dumaha's Magma Chamber;An area of pyroclastic flows and fiery clouds. Can be found in Southern Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_63098_All
string.body: Rega Guardian General Staff;The Guards of Dumaha Fortress: the Officer Guards, the NCO Guards, and the Team Guards.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_63099_All
string.body: Dumaha Shield Company;Dumaha Fortress Defence consists of Dumaha Outer and Inner Fortress Gate Protectors as well as Dumaha Shield Troop Fighters, Assassins, Battle Mages, and Archers.

string.body: Minion Administrator in Heiron;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF3_Mandia_E], an Administrator in Heiron who takes care of minions.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF3_Familiar_All
string.body: Minion Administrator in Beluslan;For all important questions about minions, go to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF3_Sanid_E] in Beluslan.

string.body: Lugbug;The Leibo on duty. He assigns various tasks to Daevas in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LC1], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8], in order to find the Leibos who are scattered to the four winds.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_FortressBattlesPromoter_L
string.body: Fortress Battle Recruiters;Daevas who publicise the Fortress Battle. Once you have participated in a Fortress Battle, they will give you a reward to thank you until you get used to the Fortress Battle. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF4_Gretes_E] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4] is one of them.

string.body: Outlaw's Blood Samples;The Nakirush Drakans can give you a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_63007c], the Daeva Mutants can give you a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_63007a], and Nakitoxic Shulacks can give you a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_63007b].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_S_Base
string.body: Ara Minima;Describes both the area where smaller Apsu altars were built, and these altars too. Ara Minima is home to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5021], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5022], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5023] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5024].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_M_Base
string.body: Ara Mediocra;Describes both the area where medium-sized Apsu altars were built, and these altars too. Ara Mediocra is home to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5025], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5026], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5027] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5028].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_L_Base
string.body: Ara Magna;Describes both the area where colossal Apsu altars were built and the altars themselves. Ara Magna is home to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5029], the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5030] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5031].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Stellaky_Love_Island
string.body: Love Island;An island so small that it barely registers on the map. It takes its name from its shape – a tiny heart.

string.body: Rega Drakan Soldiers;They include Rega Drakan Fighters, Assassins, Battle Mages and Medics of the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3_Lega].

string.body: Entrance[pl:"Entrances"] to Prometun's Workshop;An entrance to Prometun's Workshop. Can be found in the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Jan_Event_FieldBoss_Monster
string.body: Obituary Boss Monster[pl:"Monsters"];Takun the Terrible, Andre, Menotios or Grand Chieftain Saendukal show up at certain times in Dumaha's plains, deserts or in the volcanic region.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Jan_Event_Legion_Monster
string.body: Obituary Monster[pl:"Monsters"];Appears as soon as you open Twilight Chest in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Jan_Event_IDLegion] containing the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Jan_Event_Legion_Key].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Jan_Event_IDLegion
string.body: Legion Banquet Hall;Only for invited guests. Entry for multiple people is provided for group, alliance and league members from the same Legion. You can enter via the Banquet Hall Entrance in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Jan_Event_Legion_Key
string.body: Twilight Key[pl:"Keys"];For Legions whose members are logged in for a total of more than 30 hours, the Legion Tribune will receive a Bundle containing a Twilight Key once a day.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDBattle_Change
string.body: Illumiel;One of Lady Lumiel's illusions used to train Asmodian Daevas. Presently, the Elyos Life Debt Legion and the Asmodian Wise Judgement Legion are facing off. You can enter at certain times once the Entry Request is active.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDDreadgion_04
string.body: Ashunatal Dredgion;A Dredgion commanded by Brigade General Ashunatal. It is carrying Tiamat's last remaining forces. You can enter at certain times once the Entry Request is active.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEternity_War
string.body: Neviwind Canyon;An ancient Jotun city that has been changed by the influence of the Artefact Core Fragment. You can enter at certain times once the Entry Request is active.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re
string.body: Runatorium;An arena created by the Rune for entertainment purposes. Only ruins are left standing today. You can enter at certain times once the Entry Request is active.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_craft_gather_a_80a
string.body: Titania Collector[pl:"Collectors"];Elyos get this from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Lorona_E], Asmodians from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Psyche_E]. Can also be purchased after successfully conquering an altar from the Stellium General Goods Administrator or the Stellium Crafting Merchant.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Altar_Quest_L
string.body: Quest[pl:"Quests"] for Altar Development Assistance;Issued by the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Sbase_Messenger_L_E], the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Mbase_Messenger_L_E] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Lbase_Messenger_L_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Altar_Quest_D
string.body: Quest[pl:"Quests"] for Altar Development Assistance;Issued by the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Sbase_Messenger_D_E], the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Mbase_Messenger_D_E] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Lbase_Messenger_D_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDBattle_Change_Transform
string.body: Illumiel's Transformation Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"];Can be obtained from level 2 and 3 Illumiel's Transformation Statues. To purchase it you will need Battlefield Points, which you receive for each victory against Illumiel's Fighters and Siege Tanks.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_AB1_Fortress
string.body: Divine Fortress Battle;Elyos take part in this fight in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and Asmodians in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1]. You can enter via the Legion Advance Corridor to the Fleet Anchor Site.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Fortress
string.body: Lakrum Fortress Battle;Elyos take part in this fight in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and Asmodians in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1]. You can enter at the Legion Advance Corridor to the Lakrum Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Fortress
string.body: Dumaha Fortress Battle;You can enter via the Legion Advance Corridor to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Explore_Base
string.body: Dumaha Research Centres;Research centres containing the latest technology and that have been set up by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella] for researching Dumaha. These include the Volcanic Ash Research Centre in the south-east and the Sand Castle Research Centre in the south-west of Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_GM_NPC_01
string.body: GM Stava's Clone;A GM clone hiding in Dumaha. He only appears at certain times.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_GM_NPC_02
string.body: GM Lina's Clone;A GM clone that has appeared for the new year. She protects a big GM Gift Box in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_GM_NPC_03
string.body: Large GM Gift Box;A gift box that the GM has prepared to celebrate the new year. You can find it in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_GM_GiftBox_key
string.body: GM Gift Key[pl:"Keys"];A key for a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_GM_NPC_03]. You receive it from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_GM_NPC_01] when you complete the quest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_BM_Ninth_Stigma_Quest_NPC
string.body: Neyne;You can find the NPC in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_BM_enchant_stigma
string.body: Stigma Enchantment Stone[pl:"Stones"];If a Stigma is socketed successfully, you can use this to enchant a Stigma.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_10th_Altar_War_Quest
string.body: Quest[pl:"Quests"] for the Guardian General Battle;As soon as the score between the Elyos and Asmodians has been determined after the Dumaha Altar Siege Battle in Dumaha on Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday after 8 PM, the quest will be issued near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5030].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_NPC_Valentine_Shugo
string.body: Chocorunerk;A Shugo chef whose sweet delicacies pleasure every palate. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_choco_piece_01
string.body: Piece[pl:"Pieces"] of Sinister Chocolate;Available during the event period in the attack on Makarna of Bitterness, Prometun's Workshop, Prometun's Workshop (difficult), Stella Development Laboratory (easy) and Stella Development Laboratory (difficult).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_NPC_BM_Enchant_R_PvP_Trade
string.body: Puyck;An Enchantment Stone Master who has appeared in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha. You can get special goods from him in exchange for legendary PvP Enchantment Stones.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_NPC_BM_Enchant_R_PvE_Trade
string.body: Vuyck;An Enchantment Stone Master who has appeared in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha. You can get special goods from him in exchange for legendary PvE Enchantment Stones.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_MATERIAL_LDF7_A0_80A
string.body: Genesis Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A crystal within which Aion's power slumbers. Can be acquired in lots of ways in Lakrum and Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Battle_for_material_01_L
string.body: Guardian Crisis Consultant;Located near Soul Healer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_SoulHealer_L] in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Battle_for_material_01_D
string.body: Archon Crisis Consultant;Located near Soul Healer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_SoulHealer_D] in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Mineral_War_01
string.body: Winding Tower[pl:"Towers"];A tower made of Drakan bones. It helps the Rega to mine [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Rega_material] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Mineral_War_02
string.body: Reinforced Winding Tower[pl:"Towers"];A tower made of strong Drakan bones. It helps the Rega to mine [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Rega_material] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Rega_material
string.body: Drakan Opal[pl:"Opals"];A mysterious mineral that only shows up in Dumaha. Its exact purpose still hasn't been uncovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Rega_treasure_box_B
string.body: Rega Treasure Chest[pl:"Chests"];A box of Rega Drakan treasures.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Rega_treasure_box_A
string.body: Rega Glory Chest[pl:"Chests"];A treasure chest full of Rega Drakan treasures. Contains more treasure than a Rega Treasure Chest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_ldf8_material_item_skill_01
string.body: Tunnel Explosive[pl:"Explosives"];Used to destroy the tunnels for the Rega Drakans' mineral mining.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Battle_for_material_02_L
string.body: Mister McByver;A Daeva who looks good and recognises the full potential of each and every material. Located near Soul Healer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_SoulHealer_L] in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Battle_for_material_02_D
string.body: Mister McDyver;A Daeva who looks good and recognises the full potential of each and every material. Located near Soul Healer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_SoulHealer_D] in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_ldf8_material_extractor_01
string.body: Opal Dismantler;A tool that splits the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_LDF8_Rega_material] into fine fragments.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Goldensand_store
string.body: Gold Sand Shop;Run by Shugo merchants who accept Kinah and Gold Ingots as valid currency.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_NPC_L_Shugo_idrun_ap_E
string.body: Kikurinerk;A Shugo who transforms your Abyss treasure into AP. Can be found near the Stella employee [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Apeiron_E] in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_white_piece_01
string.body: Lucky Malachite;A crystal shard that brings you luck. Collect 25 shards and take them to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lugbug_All] and exchange them for gifts.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Lugbug_All
string.body: Lugbug;The Leibo on duty. He assigns various tasks to Daevas in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_0], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LC1], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8], in order to find the Leibos who are scattered to the four winds.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDSweep_03_S2_Nmd_05_M
string.body: Count Ghory;A terrible contemporary who revels in the misfortune of others and even contributes to it himself. You can find him in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDSweep_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDSweep_03
string.body: House Ghory's Gold Vault;This is where all the wealth of Count and Countess Ghory is stored. You can access this in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDAb1_MiniCastle_Light_All
string.body: Nochsana Guardian Training Master;The title of Master [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF3_IDAb1_MiniCastle], who is responsible for providing ascension assistance to the Guardians at the Research Centre Guard Post, the Inggison Illusion Fortress and in the New Start Legion Headquarters. [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_60622a] appears if you can show a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_60623a], a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_60624a] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF3_IDAb1_MiniCastle].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDAb1_MiniCastle_Dark_All
string.body: Nochsana Archon Training Master;The title of Master [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF3_IDAb1_MiniCastle], who is responsible for providing ascension assistance to the Archons at the Kidorun's Campsite, Gelkmaros Fortress and in the Temple of Oblivion. [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_70622a] appears if you can show a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_70623a], a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_70624a] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF3_IDAb1_MiniCastle].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_VoiceCube
string.body: Dictacube[pl:"Dictacubes"];A puzzling polyhedron that records the voice of its owner. It has been developed using the latest Stella Corporation technology. The cube is being further developed so it will also be able to record videos in the near future.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Onstagram_shugo_01
string.body: Starnerk;A Shugo who is a wandering general merchant. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Onstagram_Frame_All
string.body: Bloomstagram[pl:"Bloomstagrams"];A snapshot that you can set up all over [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] – except in Stellusia and the Dumaha Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_BM_Stigma_Researcher
string.body: Stiegrin;You can find the NPC in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_01
string.body: Mountain Forest Base;Encompasses the strategic facilities of the 701st Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3], the 702nd Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B7] and the 703rd Garrison at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_02
string.body: Western Meadow Base;Encompasses the strategic facilities of the 704th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A1_A6] and the 705th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_03
string.body: Eastern Meadow Base;Encompasses the strategic facilities of the 706th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_A5_A7] and the 707th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_04
string.body: Snow Mountain Base;Encompasses the strategic facilities of the 708th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_QUEST], the 709th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E4] and the 710th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E6].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_05
string.body: Wasteland Base;Encompasses the strategic facilities of the 711th Garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B1], the 712th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6] and the 713th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5a_SZ_B6_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_06
string.body: 6th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 715th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B6], the 716th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B7] and the 717th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B8].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_07
string.body: 7th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 718th Garrison on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_D], the 719th Garrison on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_QUEST], the 720th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2] and the 721st Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5a_SZ_B6_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_08
string.body: 8th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 721st Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5a_SZ_B6_1], the 722nd Garrison on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_B9], the 723rd Garrison at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_F] and the 724th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E2_QUEST].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_09
string.body: 9th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 725th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_10
string.body: 10th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 726th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1_CV], the 727th Garrison in on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1] and the 728th Garrison at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_11
string.body: 11th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 729th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_A3_2], the 730th Garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A3_1] and the 731st Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_A3_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_12
string.body: 12th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 732nd Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1], the 733rd Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B3] and the 734th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_13
string.body: 13th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 735th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_E1_2], the 736th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1], the 737th Garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E3] and the 738th Garrison on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_14
string.body: 14th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 739th Garrison on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4], the 740th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_1] and the 741st Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_15
string.body: 15th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 741st Garrison on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_2], the 742nd Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_F1], the 743rd Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_F1_1] and the 744th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_16
string.body: 16th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 744th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1], the 745th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1_2] and the 746th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_17
string.body: 17th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 747th Garrison in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B2], the 748th Garrison on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4] and the 749th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_18
string.body: 18th Depot;Designation for the strategic facilities of the 750th Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_QuestAcquire_light_A
string.body: Guardian Tribune[pl:"Tribunes"];These include the Katalam Guardian Tribunes [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Paulo_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Blius_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Reucos_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_QuestAcquire_light_B
string.body: Union Crisis Consultant[pl:"Consultants"];These include the Katalam Union Crisis Consultants [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Moldio_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Armatos_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Poultis_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_QuestAcquire_Dark_A
string.body: Archon Tribune[pl:"Tribunes"];These include the Katalam Archon Tribunes [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Kapel_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Paik_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Beneti_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_QuestAcquire_Dark_B
string.body: Union Crisis Consultant[pl:"Consultants"];These include the Katalam Union Crisis Consultants [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Parsal_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Kuf_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Shutin_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_1st_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 1st Guardian Front;Commands the 701st, 702nd and 703rd Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_2nd_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 2nd Guardian Front;Commands the 704th and 705th Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_3rd_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 3rd Guardian Front;Commands the 706th and 707th Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_4th_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 4th Guardian Front;Commands the 708th, 709th and 710th Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_5th_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 5th Guardian Front;Commands the 711th, 712th and 713th Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_6th_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 6th Guardian Front;Commands the 715th, 716th and 717th Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_06].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_7th_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 7th Guardian Front;Commands the 718th, 719th, 720th and 721st Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_07].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_8th_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 8th Guardian Front;Commands the 721st, 722nd, 723rd and 724th Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_08].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_9th_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 9th Guardian Front;Commands the 725th Guardian Garrison at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_09].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_10th_Company_Guardian_Commander
string.body: Regimental Colonel of the 10th Guardian Front;Commands the 726th, 727th and 728th Guardian Garrisons at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_KeyPoint_10].

string.body: Reconquista Assassins;Includes all Balaur assassins that turn up to conquer the garrisons. The garrisons will fall to the Balaur if you don't defeat the Assassin Commanders.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_AIONFarm_Weed_NPC
string.body: Climbing Kale;This vine plant can be found everywhere in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_aionfarm_seed_01
string.body: Simple Seeds;Umbrella term for Plains Frightcorn Seeds, Desert Fladia Seeds and Swamp Fungie Seeds. You can harvest fruit if you sow the seeds at certain locations in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_aionfarm_seed_02
string.body: Beautiful Colourful Seeds;Umbrella term for Beautiful Colourful Plains Frightcorn Seeds, Beautiful Colourful Desert Fladia Seeds and Beautiful Colourful Swamp Fungie Seeds. You can harvest fruit if you sow the seeds at certain locations in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_fruit_coin_02
string.body: Exquisite Fruit[pl:"Fruits"];Get [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_AIONFarm_Script_NPC] to judge a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_upper_fruit] to have a certain chance of receiving an Exquisite Fruit.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_fruit_coin_01
string.body: Gourmand Fruit[pl:"Fruits"];Get [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_AIONFarm_Script_NPC] to judge a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_upper_fruit] to have a certain chance of receiving a Gourmand Fruit. Alternatively, sow [%dic:STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_aionfarm_seed_02] to have a guaranteed chance of harvesting a Gourmand Fruit.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_basket_01
string.body: Full Bucket of Water;Excellent for cultivating your seeds, which are made up of [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_aionfarm_seed_01] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_aionfarm_seed_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_ItemUseArea_Farm03
string.body: Dumaha Swamps;Swampy regions where Kadarba has been sighted. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1], at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_H] and in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_aionfarm_basket_01
string.body: Empty Bucket;If you use it in the swampy areas at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1], at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_H] or in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D] where Kadarba has been sighted, you will receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_basket_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_upper_fruit
string.body: Ripe Fruit[pl:"Fruits"];Sow [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_aionfarm_seed_01] to have a guaranteed chance of harvesting Ripe Fruits... with a little patience.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_AIONFarm_Script_NPC
string.body: Gretchen;Knows her way around fruit like nobody else and makes a confident judgement about every [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_aionfarm_upper_fruit]. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.
