string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Gossip_NPC_Windiel_01
string.body: Windiel;Siel's Messenger. Elyos can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] in Lakrum and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_LOP] in Dumaha, Asmodians can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_OP], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum and at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_DOP] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF7_Base_Quest
string.body: Lakrum Garrison Quest[pl:"Quests"];You receive this quest in the Lakrum Garrison. This quest includes a PvP quest and a [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF7_Base_PvE_Quest].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF7_Base_PvE_Quest
string.body: Lakrum Garrison PvE Quest;You receive this quest from an NPC when your faction conquers the Lakrum Garrison. A [%dic:STR_DIC_material_ldf7_a0_80a] is presented as a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_Abyss_Point
string.body: Abyss Point[pl:"Points"];Awarded depending on your rank. You can use these for purchasing from the crafting material distributor. You can also use them to level up equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDF7_Mine
string.body: Hererim Mine;A mine in Lakrum that is filled with large amounts of the rare Rim Ore.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkFiD_23_An
string.body: Dark Mage Bukarota;[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF8_Altar
string.body: Altar Siege Battle;The siege battles takes place at 12 PM and 8 PM in Dumaha. The Snuwa conquer all altars at the start of the siege battle. The Snuwa High Priest appears after 5 minutes. Whoever defeats him wins. If you defeat the [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF8_Miston_Guard_Dr_01], the [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF8_Door_01_Dr_01] or the [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF8_Boss_Dr_01], you will receive the [%dic:STR_DIC_Abyss_Point].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF8_Door_01_Dr_01
string.body: Altar Barrier[pl:"Barriers"];Appears at the start of the [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF8_Altar].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF8_Miston_Guard_Dr_01
string.body: Snuwa Guard[pl:"Guards"];Appears at the start of the [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF8_Altar].

string.name: STR_DIC_LDF8_Boss_Dr_01
string.body: Snuwa High Priest;Appears 5 minutes after the start of the [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF8_Altar]. You must defeat him to conquer the altar.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Lugbug_DevaLegend_01
string.body: Sealed Treasure Chest;Description for the sealed Makarna of Bitterness Treasure Chest, the sealed Prometun's Workshop Treasure Chest, the sealed Stella Development Laboratory Treasure Chest (easy) and the sealed Stella Development Laboratory Treasure Chest (normal).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Lugbug_DevaLegend_02
string.body: Magic Fountain;You need a Wishing Coin and 120,000 Kinah to fulfil your wish at the Magic Fountain.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Lugbug_DevaLegend_03
string.body: Beritra Bundle;You can get this bundle in Illumiel, in the Neviwind Canyon, on the Kamar Battlefield, in the Runatorium and on the Ashunatal Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Guidemission_PvE_01
string.body: Subjugation Quest[pl:"Quests"];You receive them at a PvE Hunting Wind Quest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_cash_ldf8_meteo_hammer_01
string.body: Titania Hammer[pl:"Hammers"];A tool to examine [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_Meteo_E]. The more hammers you have for the inspection, the better.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_cash_ldf8_meteo_piece_01
string.body: Cosmo Corn[pl:"Corn"];You can get it by examining the Cosmonite. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_Meteo_Quest_E] will gladly exchange them for special items.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_cash_ldf8_meteo_main
string.body: Cosmonite Bundle[pl:"Bundles"];You receive it by examining cosmonites. It is as hot as the fallen meteorite.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_Meteo_E
string.body: Cosmonite[pl:"Cosmonites"];An unknown meteorite that hit [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha. Use a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_cash_ldf8_meteo_hammer_01] to examine Cosmonites and receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_wrap_cash_ldf8_meteo_main].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_Meteo_Quest_E
string.body: Theorunerk;A shugo who has specialised in the examination of [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_Meteo_E]. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_lucky_01
string.body: Quacki;A Gurriki from the meteorite that landed in Dumaha. He betrayed the Gurriki Commander and now he's hiding on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72]. Kill him to receive special rewards.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_lucky_02
string.body: Quacko;A Gurriki from the meteorite that landed in Dumaha. He betrayed the Gurriki Commander and now he's hiding on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72]. Kill him to receive special rewards.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_Entrance_E
string.body: Gatekeeper of the Incognito Hellpath;A Gurriki commander who came from a meteorite and now guards the gate to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72]. He was cruelly betrayed by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_lucky_01] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_lucky_02] and is now waiting for you to teach them a lesson.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_Meteo_Trade_E
string.body: Quacks;The Gurriki Commander's only loyal servant. He sells Incognito Keys for the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72
string.body: Incognito Hellpath;The path was discovered after a meteorite hit Dumaha. That's where [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_lucky_01] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_lucky_02], who betrayed the Gurriki Commander, are hiding.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_cash_key_idevent_def_prison
string.body: Incognito Key[pl:"Keys"];This key opens the dungeon on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72]. For every poisoned Worg you kill in the dungeon, you'll receive additional [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72_WP].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72_WP
string.body: Energy of Protection;This is required to enter the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDEvent_Def_h_v72]. Allows you to set up Artillery Towers or raise the level of Daevas of Life.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_coin_ldf5_All
string.body: Battle Insignias;They include[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_coin_ldf5_r_80a] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_coin_ldf5_f_80a].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_ring_original_01
string.body: Promise Ring[pl:"Rings"];A Witch's Ring that makes love come true. Ask [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_RingWitch_02] to specify the ring's class.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_ring_broken_01
string.body: Ring Sand;Sand that a Witch's Ring dissolves into when it breaks during upgrading. Unfortunately, it isn't possible to restore a Promise Ring from the Ring Sand.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_ring_junk_01
string.body: Ancient Trophy[pl:"Trophies"];You receive them as a symbol of your victory over Dumaha's ancient creatures: Kadabra, Yanohas, Pupuru and Rachmaga.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_ring_ancient_01
string.body: Ancient Promise Ring[pl:"Rings"];Fulfils true love, but only where the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_SnoowaHerb_Q63005] grow. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RingBird_01] will instruct you once you are in the right place.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_ring_relic_01
string.body: Legendary Promise Ring[pl:"Rings"];Fulfils true love, but only where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1] is bubbling. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RingBird_02] will instruct you once you are in the right place.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_ring_finality_01
string.body: Ultimate Promise Ring[pl:"Rings"];Fulfils true love, but only on the[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stellaky_Love_Island]. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RingBird_03] will instruct you once you are in the right place.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_wrap_event_ring_brilliant_01
string.body: Shimmering Promise Ring[pl:"Rings"];Fulfils true love, but only on the[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stellaky_Love_Island]. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RingBird_03] will instruct you once you are in the right place.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_assembly_event_ring_01
string.body: Promise Ring Shard[pl:"Shards"];Collect 10 shards to craft a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_ring_original_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_RingWitch_01
string.body: Daino;A witch who knows all the rumours in Dumaha. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_RingWitch_02
string.body: Pamred;A witch who specifies the class of Promise Rings. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_OP_RingWitch_03
string.body: Ainio;A witch who raises the class of Promise Rings. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RingBird_01
string.body: Heartbreaker Angmu;A Promise Spirit who declares blessings of love. Can be found in the spot where the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_SnoowaHerb_Q63005] grow.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RingBird_02
string.body: Heartthrob Angmu;A Promise Spirit who declares blessings of love. Can be found in the spot where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1] bubbles.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RingBird_03
string.body: Casanova Angmu;A Promise Spirit who declares blessings of love. Can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stellaky_Love_Island].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Reward_Best
string.body: The Katalam Protector's Weapons;These include: Katalam Protector's Ultimate Longsword, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Mace, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Dagger, Katalam Protector's Orb, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Spellbook, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Greatsword, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Polearm, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Staff, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Bow, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Aether Revolver, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Aether Cannon, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Stringed Instrument, Katalam Protector's Ultimate Aether Key and Katalam Protector's Ultimate Paint Rings.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Idf7_mine_UndeadDarkFiD_23_An
string.body: Dark Mage Bukarota;A Dark Mage in the Hererim Mine.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_RaidMonster_All
string.body: Ancient Creatures;Includes Kadabra, Rachmaga, Yanohas and Pupuru.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_plant_ldf5_gather_L
string.body: Ponica Fibre[pl:"Fibres"];A collecting material from Red Katalam that is obtained with the help of a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_metal_ldf5_gather_L
string.body: Carbonium;A collecting material from Red Katalam that is obtained with the help of a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_jewelry_ldf5_gather_L
string.body: Peridot;A collecting material from Red Katalam that is obtained with the help of a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_plant_ldf5_gather_D
string.body: Ponica Fibre[pl:"Fibres"];A collecting material from Red Katalam that is obtained with the help of a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_metal_ldf5_gather_D
string.body: Carbonium;A collecting material from Red Katalam that is obtained with the help of a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_jewelry_ldf5_gather_D
string.body: Peridot;A collecting material from Red Katalam that is obtained with the help of a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_MagicBook_Trade
string.body: Blinki;A fairy who flies around Atreia with Collecto. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_MagicBook_Quest
string.body: Collecto;An anxious collector. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_key_magical_book_01
string.body: Secret Key[pl:"Keys"];A key to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_MagicBook_EventBox].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_cash_key_magical_book_01
string.body: Lightning Key[pl:"Keys"];A key to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_MagicBook_CashBox]. You need 5 of these to open the Lightning Chest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_MagicBook_EventBox
string.body: Secret Chest[pl:"Chests"] (Class A);You can find the chest in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_MagicBook_CashBox
string.body: Lightning Chest[pl:"Chests"] (Class S);You can find the chest in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_L_Grade
string.body: Elyos[pl:"Elyos"];An Elyos Daeva walking the paths of Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_L_Grade14
string.body: Elyos Officer[pl:"Officers"] with 5 Stars;An Elyos Daeva who has distinguished themselves through excellent service. In combat a victory over Elyos is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_L_Grade15
string.body: Elyos General[pl:"Generals"];An Elyos Daeva who has distinguished themselves through impeccable service. In combat a victory over Elyos is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_L_Grade16
string.body: Elyos Major General[pl:"Generals"];An Elyos Daeva who has distinguished themselves through exemplary service. In combat a victory over Elyos is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_L_Grade17
string.body: Elyos Commander[pl:"Commanders"];An Elyos Daeva who has distinguished themselves through outstanding service. In combat a victory over Elyos is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_L_Grade18
string.body: Elyos Governor[pl:"Governors"];An Elyos Daeva who has distinguished themselves through excellent service.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_D_Grade
string.body: Asmodian[pl:"Asmodians"];An Asmodian Daeva walking the paths of Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_D_Grade14
string.body: Asmodian Officer[pl:"Officers"] with 5 Stars;An Asmodian Daeva who has distinguished themselves through excellent service. In combat a victory over Asmodians is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_D_Grade15
string.body: Asmodian General[pl:"Generals"];An Asmodian Daeva who has distinguished themselves through impeccable service. In combat a victory over Asmodians is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_D_Grade16
string.body: Asmodian Major General[pl:"Generals"];An Asmodian Daeva who has distinguished themselves through exemplary service. In combat a victory over Asmodians is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_D_Grade17
string.body: Asmodian Commander[pl:"Commanders"];An Asmodian Daeva who has distinguished themselves through outstanding service. In combat a victory over Asmodians is also rated with an even higher rank.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Rank_D_Grade18
string.body: Asmodian Governor[pl:"Governors"];An Asmodian Daeva who has distinguished themselves through excellent service.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_SERVERCRAFT3_SNACK
string.body: Treat[pl:"Treats"];[%dic:STR_DIC_E__LOSTDOG] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LOSTCAT]'s preferred food. You can get them from login rewards.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_SERVERCRAFT3_DOG_TOKEN
string.body: Woof Mark[pl:"Marks"];Available for every fifth Treat that you've fed to [%dic:STR_DIC_E__LOSTDOG].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_SERVERCRAFT3_CAT_TOKEN
string.body: Mewl Mark[pl:"Marks"];Available for every fifth Treat that you've fed to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LOSTCAT].

string.name: STR_DIC_E__LOSTDOG
string.body: Rascali;A stray, hungry little dog. Mewls for [%dic:STR_DIC_E_SERVERCRAFT3_SNACK] all the time. Has been sighted near Dumaha's altar area.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LOSTCAT
string.body: Tramp;A stray, hungry little kitten. Mewls for [%dic:STR_DIC_E_SERVERCRAFT3_SNACK] all the time. Has been sighted near Dumaha's altar area.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Anubis_E
string.body: Netherworld Envoy Kilt;A bloodhound of[%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER]' underworld and shadows. Collects fragments of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] at certain times at Anubis' behest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Ramsus_E
string.body: Ramses;[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Cleo_E]'s beloved. He appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha at certain times to find [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01] once again.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_AnubisReward
string.body: Fluto;Appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Anubis_E]'s side have a slight lead in the number of fragments of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01] they've managed to collect.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_RamsusReward
string.body: Teres;Appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Ramsus_E]' side have a slight lead in the number of fragments of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01] they've managed to collect.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Cleo_E
string.body: Cleo;[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Ramsus_E]' beloved and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER]' muse. She can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_AnubisReward_Fail
string.body: Sechem-Toth;Appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Anubis_E]'s side have a slight lead in the number of fragments of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01] they've managed to collect.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_RamsusReward_Fail
string.body: Golden Horus Ramses;Appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] when [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Ramsus_E]' side have a slight lead in the number of fragments of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01] they've managed to collect.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_ChangeCoin
string.body: Muto;A Skurv who is hiding in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_LDF8_fightClub_1] in Dumaha. You can go to him to exchange a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_ANUBIS_COIN_01] for a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEO_COIN_01] in return for a certain amount of Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER
string.body: Anubis;The god of the dead. He guides them to his realm. He fell for [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Cleo_E], Ramses' beloved, and abducts her in his harem.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_01
string.body: Anubis Sentry[pl:"Sentries"];A bodyguard for the great [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_02
string.body: Anubis Tomb Guard[pl:"Guards"];A bodyguard for the great [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_03
string.body: Hellbound Soul[pl:"Souls"];Appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_05
string.body: Dynastic Rift[pl:"Rifts"];The thieving [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER] opened this space-time rift to acquire [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Cleo_E]'s soul. There's a certain probability that [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_All] will pour out of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER_EASY
string.body: Anubis Avatar[pl:"Avatars"];Summoned by an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_SUMMON_ANUBIS_01]. Every time you defeat an avatar, you get back part of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEOSOUL_01
string.body: Cleo's Soul;Take this wayward soul, whose fragments are bound in stone, to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Ramsus_E] if you worship Ramses and to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Anubis_E] if you worship Anubis. Exchange the soul fragments for a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEO_COIN_01] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_ANUBIS_COIN_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEO_COIN_01
string.body: Hathor Emblem[pl:"Emblems"];Proof that you worship [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_Ramsus_E]. Can be exchanged for a reward with [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_RamsusReward_Fail] or [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_RamsusReward].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_ANUBIS_COIN_01
string.body: Horus Emblem[pl:"Emblems"];Proof that you worship [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER]. Can be exchanged for a reward with [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_AnubisReward_Fail] or [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_AnubisReward].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_SUMMON_ANUBIS_01
string.body: Anubis Stone[pl:"Stones"];Use the stone in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] and in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF7] to summon an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER_EASY].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ASSEMBLY_JIKILLORKILL_SUMMON_ANUBIS_PIECE
string.body: Anubis Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Material used to make an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_SUMMON_ANUBIS_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_All
string.body: Soul Reavers;They include[%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_KINGMONSTER], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_02] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_V72_EGYPT_MONSTER_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_ChangeCoin_02
string.body: Vario;A Skurv who is hiding in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_LDF8_fightClub_1] in Dumaha. You can go to him to exchange a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_CLEO_COIN_01] for a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_JIKILLORKILL_ANUBIS_COIN_01] in return for a certain amount of Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_ChangeCoin_all
string.body: Black Market Traders;They include [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_ChangeCoin] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_ZKillorKill_ChangeCoin_02], who have hidden themselves in Dumaha's [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_LDF8_fightClub_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Shugo_01
string.body: Collectinerk;An insect collector. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha and at the main landing sites in Red Katalam during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Shugo_02
string.body: Ecorinerk;An ecologist in Katalam. Can be found at the main landing sites in Red Katalam during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Spaky_B_80_Ae
string.body: Red Sparkie[pl:"Sparkies"];An invasive species that has appeared in Red Katalam. You can find them from 10 AM-12 PM, from 3-5 PM and from 9-11 PM on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_B9].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Spaky_H_80_n
string.body: Oculus Flavi[pl:"Flavis"];An invasive species that has appeared in the north of Red Katalam. You can find them from 10 AM-12 PM, from 3-5 PM and from 9-11 PM in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Muta_80_n
string.body: Sac Sylph[pl:"Sylphs"];An invasive species that has appeared in Red Katalam. You can find them from 10 AM-12 PM, from 3-5 PM and from 9-11 PM in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E2_QUEST].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_GJP_quest_junk_01
string.body: Hunting Permit[pl:"Permits"];You need these to collect Species Samples. You can buy them from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Shugo_02]. You can't take the samples to Collectinerk without a Hunting Permit.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_50224_all
string.body: Species Sample[pl:"Samples"];You can get them from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Spaky_B_80_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Spaky_H_80_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_GJP_Muta_80_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_01
string.body: Honey Daru[pl:"Darus"];Carries around a glass of honey. You can collect the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_05] by defeating the Daru. He can be found near the altar that has been conquered by the opposing faction.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_02
string.body: Honey Cake Workbench;A magical workbench that you can use to make Honey Cake with the power of the Moon Rabbit. You can find it under the Kaki Tree in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_03
string.body: Pine Needle Full Moon;A white full moon that rises between 8 PM and 10 PM in Dumaha. It leaves behind a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_06] if you defeat it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_04
string.body: Linnai;The happiest employee in the Moon Rabbit Gift Shop. If you take her Honey Cake and Kinah, she might wrap your Honey Cake even more artistically. You can find her near the Kaki Tree in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_05
string.body: Honey;Sugary sweet honey from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_01]. An ingredient for Honey Cake.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_06
string.body: Pine Needle[pl:"Needles"];A special pine needle that carries within it a wish from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_03]. An ingredient for Honey Cake.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_07
string.body: Rice Powder;Complete [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_08]'s quest or defeat a monster from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_09] to receive this powder. An ingredient for Honey Cake.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_08
string.body: Journinerk;A Shugo who manages the rice powder in the Moon Rabbit Mill, which has been around for 11 years. Take [%dic:STR_DIC_I_coin_ldf8_reward_01], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_matter_slot_open_c_01] or Gold Ingots to him in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] so he can use them to extract the rare rice powder.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_09
string.body: Journinerk's Diary[pl:"Diaries"];An extract from the diary: 'Oh, what a shock! I saw the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_Boss_04], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF7_Weapon_Boss_Final_Human_80_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDSeal_Boss_Vritra_Human_Lv1_N_65_Ah]'s Shroud, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_Boss_Leader_Easy_75_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_73_Ah] and fled in such a panic that I forgot to bring [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SONGPYEON_07], akakak!'

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_water
string.body: Fire Nectar;Required for cultivating a healthy [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_tonic
string.body: Blossom Fertiliser;Essential for cultivating plants, especially for [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_trowel
string.body: Plant Cell[pl:"Cells"];A handy tool used on [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_02] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_pot
string.body: Flower Pot[pl:"Pots"];Right-click in your inventory to turn it into a fully blossomed Wild Flower Bouquet. Can only be used in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_flower
string.body: Wild Flowers;A bouquet of wild meadow flowers that finally grew from a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_03] thanks to the frequent use of a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_trowel].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_01
string.body: Seedling[pl:"Seedlings"];The soft green holds the promise of a fully blossomed vista.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_02
string.body: Young Plant[pl:"Plants"];These have been diligently nourished with Fire Nectar and they've shot right up in no time.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_03
string.body: Flowering Shoot[pl:"Shoots"];It's had a taste of Blossom Fertiliser and - wonder of wonders - has blossomed.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Shugo_01
string.body: Seedlinerk;Dedicates himself entirely to the well-being of the wild flower seedlings. Can be found in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Shugo_02
string.body: Sproutinerk;Dedicates himself entirely to the well-being of the wild flower seedlings. Can be found in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_water_empty
string.body: Empty Nectar Bottle[pl:"Bottles"];The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_water] was all used up on the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_tonic_empty
string.body: Fertiliser Shell[pl:"Shells"];The precious [%dic:STR_DIC_E_event_sprout_tonic] was all used up by the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_Sprout_Pot_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_01
string.body: Maumi;A baker at the Big Belly Bakery, which has been around for 11 years. She's looking in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha for a Daeva who can take [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_03] to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_02
string.body: Kekirinerk;Seems to have got lost somewhere in Dumaha. If you take [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_03] to him, you'll receive a tasty reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_03
string.body: Kekirinerk's Delivery Bag;[%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_02] forgot to take this bag with him. You can get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_04
string.body: Box Monster[pl:"Monsters"];A suspicious box that has appeared in the Sand Squall, Drytongue, the Sand Castle Research Centre and the Volcanic Ash Research Centre. If you kill the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_04], you'll receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_05
string.body: Strawberry Cake[pl:"Cakes"];If you take the cake to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_06] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_07], you'll receive sweet items in return.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_06
string.body: Hungrinerk;A Shugo who likes [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_05]. He was trying to find a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_10] in Dumaha, but has got himself lost.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_07
string.body: Fullinerk;A Shugo who likes [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_05]. You can find him in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_08
string.body: Berrinerk;A Shugo who sells special items. He was trying to find a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_10] in Dumaha, but has got himself lost.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_09
string.body: Bakebold;A Kobold who likes [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_05]. You meet him if you can find the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_10] that has appeared somewhere in Dumaha. Bakebold gets aggressive if the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_10] isn't nearby.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_10
string.body: Giant Cake Box;A cake box protected by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_09]. It appears somewhere in Dumaha. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_06], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_02] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_08] have been locked inside this box. Kill [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_SHUGOS2CAKE_09] and free the Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_directportal_Start_LDF5b_L_01
string.body: Corridor to the 81st Garrison;Appears 5 times a day next to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Galad_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_directportal_Start_LDF5b_L_02
string.body: Corridor to the Prades Fortress;Appears 3 times a day next to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Castano_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_directportal_Start_LDF5b_D_01
string.body: Corridor to the 81st Garrison;Appears 5 times a day next to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Kalden_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_directportal_Start_LDF5b_D_02
string.body: Corridor to the Prades Fortress;Appears next to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Shurnik_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_Castle_Portal
string.body: Dynastic Key[pl:"Keys"];A device that opens the Corridor to the Prades Fortress. If it is destroys, whoever used it to enter the corridor will be returned to North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_To_LDF5b_Prades_L
string.body: Prades Patrol;This includes [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Aerocus_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Apsines_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Araros_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kicocreon_E] at the Prades Fortress Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_To_LDF5b_Prades_D
string.body: Prades Patrol;This includes [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Granir_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Askold_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Bjorn_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Einar_E] at the Prades Fortress Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_CASH_LUXURY_COIN
string.body: Luxurinerk's Lucky Coin[pl:"Coins"];You need these in order to get a Puzzle Chest. Collect 10 of them and go to the Puzzle Chest Tower.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_CASH_LUXURY_JEWEL
string.body: Luxurinerk's Jewel[pl:"Jewels"];This item is stored in the Puzzle Chest Tower. You need 35 of these to get a Mega Lucky Chest. Collect them all and take them to Luxurinerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_L_01
string.body: Targets in the South-west;Monsters in south-western Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A_Deer_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A_Bat_Dyn_75_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A_Mushroom_75_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A_TreeGoblin_75_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B_WoollyBear_77_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_D_01
string.body: Targets in the South-east;Monsters in south-eastern Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A2_Deer_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A2_Kyanchi_75_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A2_HolyMushroom_75_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_A2_TreeGoblin_75_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B2_CrocodileMan_77_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_L_02
string.body: Targets in the West;Monsters in western Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B_Noctiluca_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B_ChameleonMan_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B_Frillfaimam_Plant_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C_ChameleonMan_78_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C_Noctiluca_78_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C_Stingray_78_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_D_02
string.body: Targets in the East;Monsters in eastern Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B2_SeaMonster_Forest_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_B2_Guardian_Sea_76_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C2_CrowMan_78_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C2_DemonShadow_78_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_C2_Wildboar_78_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_L_03
string.body: Targets in the North-west;Monsters in North-west Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_nepilim_Dyn_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_SadoFighter_Ruins_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D_WoodenGigant_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_ElephantBirdRe_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_PigNight_80_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_Valak_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_D_03
string.body: Targets in the north-east;Monsters in eastern Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_ElephantBird_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_Fox_nightRe_79_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_D2_PigNight_79_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_ElephantBirdRe_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_PigNight_80_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_E_Valak_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_04
string.body: Targets in the South;Monsters in South Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_Fishman_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_LizardmanFighter_Bone_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_PirateZombie_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_PirateZombieRe_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_SeaMonster_80_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_SharkAssassinRe_80_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_G_Worm_Blue_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_Hunt_05
string.body: Targets in the Centre;Monsters in Central Lakrum. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Dionaea_White_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_ElephantBird_80_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_neutFly_Ruins_80_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Sam_Ruin_80_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF7_F_Zaif_Plant_80_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Aion_Event_Halloween_Quest
string.body: Screamer;Knows the hidden story. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_halloween_voice01
string.body: Notice I;A notice from the Crazy Little Ghost. You hear a message from someone when you play it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_halloween_voice02
string.body: Notice II;A notice from the Dreadful Guesthouse. You hear a message from someone when you play it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_halloween_voice03
string.body: Notice III;A notice from Llanero. You hear a message from someone when you play it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_event_halloween_voice04
string.body: Notice IV;A notice once Llanero is defeated. You hear a message from someone when you play it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Aion_Event
string.body: The Dreadful Guesthouse;Llanero is waiting for you here. Choose your opponent: Vampirina, Frankenshock, Jack Nox or Frightchamun. The result of the fight decides whether Phantonicht then takes the stage or not.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_AION_Event_FieldMonster_All
string.body: Quartet of Darkness;This includes Vampirina, Frankenshock, Jack Nox and Frightchamun. You encounter them every hour at a random location in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_TwinkleDeva_01
string.body: Rally Box[pl:"Boxes"];These are extra rewards waiting for everyone who completes Prometun's Workshop (normal) within 25 minutes, Makarna of Bitterness within 15 minutes, Stella Development Laboratory (easy/normal) within 25 minutes and Beninerk's Manor (easy/normal) within 30 minutes.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Legion_Digger_Wave_Monster
string.body: Booming Monsters;Startled by the activation of the Winding Tower, they show up every 10 minutes to destroy the Winding Tower.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Pandaroongs_Start_Portal_L
string.body: Pandarung Entrance[pl:"Entrances"];Appears daily at 9 PM by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Timotheus_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Pandaroongs_Start_Portal_D
string.body: Pandarung Entrance[pl:"Entrances"];Appears daily at 9 PM by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Bayez_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Assembly_key_Piece
string.body: Garrison Crystals;These can be obtained by taking down Assassin Commanders or Archon/Guardian Mages. The crystals can be combined to make different Crystal Keys.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_IDLDF5Re_Solo
string.body: Unstable Hall of Knowledge;The entrance is located near the 701st Garrison at the Lake of Solitude. It only opens at certain times. Use the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Assembly_key_Piece] from the 701st Garrison and 712th Garrison together to craft the key you'll need to enter.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Acorn_Union
string.body: Oakle Union;An alliance of Shugo merchants who use [%dic:STR_DIC_I_coin_f3_reward_01] as a currency and potter around in Heiron or Beluslan

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Acorn_UnionMember
string.body: Oakle Trader[pl:"Traders"];A Shugo trader with the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Acorn_Union]. His eyes light up whenever he sees [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_coin_f3_reward_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q63950
string.body: Watchtower Denizens;A [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_001] draws in all kinds of creatures. They include in particular [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Fethlot_32_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Zaif_30_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_KalnifRE_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q63960
string.body: Saurian Skirmishers;[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamBaby1st_37_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamNM1st_37_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Frillfaimam1st_37_An] that dwell in the undergrowth of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Dr_All
string.body: 46th Beritra Infiltrators;Soldiers of Beritra that have overrun Gelkmaros. Includes the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Fi_Dr], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dreadgion_Pod_As_Dr], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Ra_Dr] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Wi_Dr].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Dr_All
string.body: 46th Prahma Infiltrators;Soldiers of Beritra that have overrun Inggison. They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Fi_Dr], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_Dreadgion_Pod_As_Dr], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Ra_Dr] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_Dreadgion_Pod_Wi_Dr].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Dreadgion_Boss_All
string.body: 46th Beritra Captains;The captains of the Beritra army's Dredgion Armada, who have overrun Gelkmaros. They include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dreadgion_A_Boss_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dreadgion_B_Boss_01] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dreadgion_C_Boss_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Dreadgion_Boss_All
string.body: 46th Prahma Captains;The captains of the Beritra army's Dredgion Armada, who have overrun Inggison. They include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_Dreadgion_A_Boss_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_Dreadgion_B_Boss_01] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_Dreadgion_C_Boss_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Base_Boss
string.body: Legate[pl:"Legates"];An officer dispatched to defend the Lakrum Garrison. Appears 10 minutes after the garrison is captured.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Base_Artifact
string.body: Artefact[pl:"Artefacts"];Causes a powerful effect, such as a buff in the vicinity or high damage. Can only be used by the faction or legion that has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Gateway_01_Guard_All
string.body: Marayas Northgate Guards;They guard the Marayas Northgate. They include the North Gate Fighters, Guards and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Gateway_02_Guard_All
string.body: Vorgaltem Gate Guards;They guard the Vorgaltem Gate. They include the Vorgaltem Fighters, Guards and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Gateway_03_Guard_All
string.body: Marayas Southgate Guards;They guard the Marayas Southgate. They include the South Gate Fighters, Guards and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Gateway_05_Guard_All
string.body: Spiritfall Gate Guards;They guard the Spiritfall Gate. They include the Spiritfall Forest Fighters, Guards, Medics and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Gateway_04_Guard_All
string.body: Subterranea Gate Guards;They guard the Subterranea Gate. They include the Subterranea Fighters, Guards, Medics and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_OP1_Guard_All
string.body: Gelkmaros Archons;Junior Soldiers, Detachment Commanders and Commander Centurions who defend Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Gateway_01_Guard_All
string.body: Sawtooth Valley Gate Guards;They guard the Sawtooth Valley Gate. They include the Sawtooth Fighters, Guards, Medics and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Gateway_02_Guard_All
string.body: Angrief Gate Guards;They guard the Angrief Gate. They include the Angrief Fighters, Guards, Medics and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Gateway_03_Guard_All
string.body: Hanarkand Gate Guards;They guard the Hanarkand Gate. They include the Hanarkand Fighters, Guards, Medics and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Gateway_04_Guard_All
string.body: Phanoe Gate Guards;They guard the Phanoe Gate. They include the Phanoe Fighters, Guards, Medics and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Gateway_05_Guard_All
string.body: Dimaia Gate Guards;They guard the Dimaia Gate. They include the Dimaia Fighters, Guards, Medics and Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_OP1_Guard_All
string.body: Inggison Guardians;Junior Soldiers, Detachment Commanders and Commander Centurions who defend Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_SZ_Colosseum
string.body: Inggoseum;A Coliseum somewhere in Inggison. Anyone approved to fight here has probably been chosen in secret.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_SZ_Colosseum
string.body: Gelkoseum;A Coliseum somewhere in Gelkmaros. Anyone approved to fight here has probably been chosen in secret.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_2021_guardS_Dr_All
string.body: Altar of Avarice Occupiers;Balaur who appear when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A] is captured. These include Balaur Fighters, Balaur Assassins, Balaur Archers, Balaur Mages and Balaur Priests.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_2011_guardS_Dr_All
string.body: Temple of Scales Occupiers;Balaur who appear when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] is captured. These include Balaur Fighters, Balaur Assassins, Balaur Archers, Balaur Mages and Balaur Priests.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_3011_guardS_Dr_All
string.body: Vorgaltem Citadel Occupiers;Balaur who appear when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A] is captured. These include Balaur Fighters, Balaur Assassins, Balaur Archers, Balaur Mages and Balaur Priests.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_3021_guardS_Dr_All
string.body: Crimson Temple Occupiers;Balaur who appear when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3021_A] is captured. These include Balaur Fighters, Balaur Assassins, Balaur Archers, Balaur Mages and Balaur Priests.

string.body: 1st Fatebound Flanker[pl:"Flankers"];A creature that is attacking the Asmodians at the 1st Fatebound Garrison for some inexplicable reason.

string.body: 3rd Wisplight Flanker[pl:"Flankers"];A creature that is attacking the Elyos at the 3rd Wisplight Garrison for some inexplicable reason.

string.body: 4th Wisplight Flanker[pl:"Flankers"];A creature that is attacking the Elyos at the 4th Wisplight Garrison for some inexplicable reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_61950_All
string.body: 5th Wisplight Flanker[pl:"Flankers"];A creature that is attacking the Elyos at the 5th Wisplight Garrison for some inexplicable reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q64015
string.body: Medeus Flushes;All of the memories that whirl around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D8]. They include [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_64015a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_64015b] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_64015c].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q64050
string.body: Kerubiel’s Mark of Desolation;Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_64050a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_64050b].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Guardian_Li_All
string.body: Wisplight Decurion[pl:"Decurions"];A Guardion decurion from the Wisplight Legion who is missing in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_2019_DevasDay_Quest_NPC_03
string.body: Thankinerk;An employee of the Dreamscape Committee. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha during the event period. He's dissatisfied because he wasn't made chairman.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_Dragon_Altar
string.body: Ara Infernalia;The site where [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella] awakens the Dragon Lords.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_Dragon_Altar_L
string.body: Ara Infernalia;The site where [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella] awakens the Dragon Lords. You can enter it via the entrance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_Underpass].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_Dragon_Altar_D
string.body: Ara Infernalia;The site where [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella] awakens the Dragon Lords. You can enter it via the entrance in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_Underpass].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_L
string.body: Stella Development Laboratory;A laboratory in which Nakisix is produced. Something must have happened there because all contact to the laboratory has been cut off. You can enter via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_Entrance_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_D
string.body: Stella Development Laboratory;A laboratory in which Nakisix is produced. Something must have happened there because all contact to the laboratory has been cut off. You can enter via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_Entrance_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_House_L
string.body: Beninerk's Manor;The estate belonging to Beninerk, General of the Stella Corporation. Beninerk holds a celebration here for Daevas who work for the Stella Corporation. You can enter the estate via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF8_House_Entrance_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_House_D
string.body: Beninerk's Manor;The estate belonging to Beninerk, General of the Stella Corporation. Beninerk holds a celebration here for Daevas who work for the Stella Corporation. You can enter the estate via the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF8_House_Entrance_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LabSurvivor_D
string.body: Development Laboratory Informant;A person with crucial information about the Stella Development Laboratory. This refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF4_LabSurvivor_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF8_House_Entrance_L
string.body: Entrance to Beninerk's Manor;The entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF8_House_L]. Can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Guardian_Li_All_1

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Junction_Teleport

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Base_Support_Buff_Statue
string.body: Buff Support Statue[pl:"Statues"];Appears when the Artefact garrison in Lakrum has been captured. Gives you a buff for hunting and fighting.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Underpass_Nepilim_All
string.body: Silentera Jotun;The Jotun Creators and the Jotun Juggernauts who appear in the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Underpass_Fanatic_All
string.body: Silentera Dragonbound;Members of the Dragonbound who appear in the Silentera Canyon. They include the Silentera Harbingers, Silentera Fencers, Silentera Elite Sentinels, Silentera Elite Labourers, Silentera Elite Assaulters, Silentera Elite Sorcerers, Silentera Elite Mages, Silentera Warmongers, Silentera Warpriests, Silentera Elite Spiritmasters, Silentera Sisters, Silentera Elite Defenders, Silentera Patrollers, Silentera Elite Assassins, Silentera Elite Ambushers, Silentera Sharpshooters, Silentera Guards, Silentera Elite Fighters, Silentera Vaegirs, Silentera Elite Healers, Silentera Elite Chanters, Silentera Anchorites, Silentera Elite Bodyguards, Silentera Solasters and Silentera Dark Mages.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Underpass_Drakan_All
string.body: Silentera Balaur;The 50th Drakan Superior Prefects, the 50th Drakan Superior Guard Officers, the 50th Drakan Superior Snipers, the 50th Drakan Superior Mages and the 50th Drakan Superior Manipulators in the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTag_War
string.body: Raging Valley;A valley at the southernmost point in Dumaha. Strange happenings are common here, so keep your wits about you! Word is some people never found there way out of there again...

string.name: STR_DIC_E_StellaGuard
string.body: Stella Guardian[pl:"Guardians"];They're guarding something or someone in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTag_War]. Maybe Inanna?

string.body: You know where;Pssst, you know it means... [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF8_SZ_K1_D_MissionSpot01_DOOR]...

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_Entrance_L
string.body: Entrance[pl:"Entrances"] to the Stella Development Laboratory;If you use this entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_L] instead of the main entrance, you can outwit the security system. Can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B7].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_Entrance_D
string.body: Entrance[pl:"Entrances"] to the Stella Development Laboratory;If you use this entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDLDF8_Lab_D] instead of the main entrance, you can outwit the security system. Can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B3_Castle].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q63900a
string.body: Right there;Yes, exactly, you don't enter the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTag_War] via the cross-server regions, but only via the local region.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q73900a
string.body: Right there;Yes, exactly, you don't enter the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTag_War] via the cross-server regions, but only via the local region.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q63910
string.body: Inanna;1st Lord’s Candidate. An invisible beck is leading her somewhere past the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTag_War].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q73910
string.body: Inanna;1st Lord’s Candidate. An invisible beck is leading her somewhere past the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTag_War].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_01
string.body: Morphing Book: Dreamscape Light Box (E);A Morphing Book that lets you craft '[Event] Dreamscape Light Box (E)'. You can buy it from Thankinerk for 100 Genesis Crystals. Depending on the result of the substance transformation, you receive [Event] Dreamscape Light Box (E) or [Event] Land of Nightmare Light Box (E).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_02
string.body: Dreamscape Lights (LE);Contains [Event] Dreamscape Lights (LE). It can only be opened with [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_03]. You can find [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_07] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_03
string.body: Celebrinerk's Key;The key belonging to the chairman of the Dreamscape Committee, [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_07]. You can get it by completing the quest '[Event/Group] Where are the Dreamscape Lights (LE)?'.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_04
string.body: Material;You can use [Event] Black Powder for Dreamscape Lights (I), [Event] Dye for Dreamscape Lights(I) and [Event] Fuse for Dreamscape Lights (I) to make [Event] Dreamscape Lights (I).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_05
string.body: Traders;The traders in Katalam know all about the rumours about the lights. Elyos receive quest for materials for [Event] Dreamscape Lights (I) from Naysmis, Safara and Shikren, Asmodians from Goytom, Onar and Hunir.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_06
string.body: Dreamscape Lights (T);Can be made using 40x [Event] Black Powder for Dreamscape Lights (T).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_07
string.body: Celebrinerk;The 11th chairman of the Dreamscape Committee. He's currently looking for voluntary employees. You can find [%dic:STR_DIC_E_EVENT_2019_Dday_07] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1] in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q17208_L
string.body: Central Balaurea;The central regions of Balaurea. Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LF4], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_UnderPass_Li] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_DF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_F4_Hunt_All
string.body: Harsh Wilders;This refers to all that creeps and crawls in Inggison and Gelkmaros: Wild Larails, Wild Methuses and Wild Elrocos.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Digger_Stella_Wave
string.body: Stella Brawlers;Employees from the Stella Corporation who attack incessantly when the Winding Tower is used.

Fortress Battle[pl:"Battles"];It takes place every Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday at 10 PM in the main regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q63900_a
string.body: Sanctuary Barricade;The former entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_L_MissionSpot01], now entirely overgrown. Wait! It looks like Inanna herself went to great lengths to block it off when she escaped.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q73900_a
string.body: Hideout Barricade;The former entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_D_MissionSpot01], now entirely overgrown. Wait! It looks like Inanna herself went to great lengths to block it off when she escaped.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_L
string.body: Squad Order[pl:"Orders"];You are helping the Life Debt Legion by completing this order and receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_MATERIAL_LDF7_A0_80A] as a reward. You can get one [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf7_support_quest_ticket_l] each day from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Support_Unit_Captain_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF7_Support_Quest_D
string.body: Squad Order[pl:"Orders"];You are helping the Wise Judgement Legion by completing this order and receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_MATERIAL_LDF7_A0_80A] as a reward. You can get one [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf7_support_quest_ticket_d] each day from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF7_Support_Unit_Captain_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Legion_Digger
string.body: Legion Quarry;Use a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf8_legion_digger_stone] at a Winding Tower in Dumaha to designate the tower as the legion's property. You must then fend off the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Digger_Stella_Wave] who are hindering the Odian excavations.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Urf_L
string.body: Hidden Minion Warehouse;Lots of high-grade [%dic:STR_DIC_I_MINION_EVOLUTIONSTONE_01] is stored here. You can enter with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF_Urf_enterance_li]' help.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_Urf_D
string.body: Hidden Minion Warehouse;Lots of high-grade [%dic:STR_DIC_I_MINION_EVOLUTIONSTONE_01] is stored here. You can enter with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF_Urf_enterance_da]'s help.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_81Base_Occupation
string.body: 81st Garrison Siege Battle;Takes place daily at 12 PM, 3 PM, 6 PM and 9 PM and midnight. A faction that has conquered the 81st Garrison in South Katalam wins if they manage to hold the garrison for 5 minutes. Alternatively, the faction who occupies the garrison before time is up wins.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_Prades_Fortress_Occupation
string.body: Prades Fortress Siege Battle;Takes place daily at 12 PM, 9 PM and midnight. The faction who defeats the Guardian General first and doesn't lose their Dynastic Key wins.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_Pandaroongs_Infiltration
string.body: Pandarung Battle;Begins daily at 9 PM. Enter the dungeon by transforming into a Pandarung Shugo using the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5_pandaroongs_shugo_trans_l]. You must have the Big Cargo Box in your possession at the end of the fight in order to win.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_All
string.body: Depots;Strategic facilities in Red Katalam. Includes the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_01], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_02], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_03], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_04] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_KeyPoint_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Base_Assembly_Key_All
string.body: Crystal Key[pl:"Keys"];You can get it by combining [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Assembly_key_Piece]. Includes the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5a_base_assembly_key_red], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5a_base_assembly_key_yellow], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5a_base_assembly_key_green], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5a_base_assembly_key_blue] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5a_base_assembly_key_purple].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Epis_E
string.body: Epis;An Information Officer dispatched to Dumaha. Can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Junction_Teleport] in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Harunk_E
string.body: Heyrun;An Information Officer dispatched to Dumaha. Can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Junction_Teleport] in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_51263_All
string.body: Fatebound Flanker[pl:"Flankers"];A creature that is attacking the Asmodians at the Fatebound Garrisons for some inexplicable reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_50263_All
string.body: Wisplight Flanker[pl:"Flankers"];A creature that is attacking the Elyos at the Wisplight Garrisons for some inexplicable reason.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Acorn_UnionMember_L
string.body: Heiron Oakle Trader[pl:"Traders"];He spends time in the villages that you can teleport to on the Heiron map [M]. You won't find him at the Kishar Observation Post or the Seaside Sentry Point, though.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Acorn_UnionMember_D
string.body: Beluslan Oakle Trader[pl:"Traders"];He spends time in the villages that you can teleport to on the Beluslan map [M]. But you won't find him in the destroyed Beluslan Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF3_coin_reward_Weapon_Seller_05
string.body: Modarinerk;An Oakle merchant. Can be found next to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF3_coin_reward_Armor_Seller_05] and sells equipment in exchange for Oakles.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Hunt_Small_Big_All
string.body: Inggison Wilders;This refers to all that creeps and crawls in Inggison: Wild Larails, Wild Methuses, Wild Elrocos, Wild Snufflers and Wild Bellepigs.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Hunt_Small_Big_All
string.body: Gelkmaros Wilders;This refers all that creeps and crawls in Gelkmaros: Wild Larails, Wild Methuses, Wild Elrocos, Wild Snuffler and Wild Bellepigs.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_Treasure_Monster_All
string.body: Inggison Lurkers;Monsters in Inggison who lurk in the undergrowth. Includes the Lurkipedes, Lurking Boar, Lurking Spirits, Lurking Beaters, Saturn Sylphen, Saturn Tenaklu, Saturn Frillnecks, Elyos Scouts, Rock Basilisks, Rock Crynac, Rock Arachnas, Rock Octamanes, Ice Arachnas, Ice Golems, Ice Spallers and Ice Tesinons.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Treasure_Monster_All
string.body: Gelkmaros Lurkers;Monsters in Gelkmaros who lurk in the undergrowth. Includes the Lurkipedes, Lurking Boar, Lurking Spirits, Lurking Beaters, Saturn Sylphen, Saturn Tenaklu, Saturn Frillnecks, Elyos Scouts, Rock Basilisks, Rock Crynac, Rock Arachnas, Rock Octamanes, Ice Arachnas, Ice Golems, Ice Spallers and Ice Tesinons.

string.body: 46th Prahma Infiltration Squad;They include the 46th Infiltration Fighters, the 46th Infiltration Troopers, the 46th Infiltration Lookouts and the 46th Infiltration Battle Mages.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Dreadgion_Pod_All
string.body: 46th Prahma Infiltration Squad;They include the 46th Infiltration Attackers, the 46th Infiltration Raiders, the 46th Infiltration Guards and the 46th Infiltration Foot Soldiers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Underpass_D2_List_a
string.body: Silentera Corrupters;Brown Arachnas, Jumping Kalgolems and Longtailed Drynacs in the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Underpass_D2_List_b
string.body: Silentera Pests;Blackclaw Scolopen, Stinging Sheluks and Silentera Mugolems in the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Underpass_Drakan_Ae_All
string.body: Silentera Drakan Officers;The 50th Drakan Superior Prefects, the 50th Drakan Superior Snipers, the 50th Drakan Superior Manipulators and the 50th Drakan Superior Mages in the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Rage_Disturbance
string.body: Gelkmaros Ragers;They include the Lowland Leowasps, the Acheron Drakes, the Highland Bakus and the Crawling Serrators in Gelkmaros.

string.body: Nabaru;An Elim who bears fruit full of special power. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP] during the event period.

string.body: Nabaru;An Elim who bears fruit full of special power. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_OP] during the event period.

string.body: Neligor;An Elim who stayed faithful to Brusthonin's former patron of protection, Baltasar. You can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1] in Lakrum.

string.body: Neligor;An Elim who stayed faithful to Brusthonin's former patron of protection, Baltasar. You can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1] in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_CheerUp_F5_Elim_D
string.body: Lidimtas;An Elim who stayed faithful to Brusthonin's former patron of protection, Baltasar. You can find him in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in Red Katalam (North) during the event period.

string.body: Frozen Agrint[pl:"Agrints"];Appears near the 3rd, 4th and 5th Wisplight Garrison in Inggison.

string.body: Frozen Agrint[pl:"Agrints"];Appears near the 3rd, 4th and 5th Fatebound Garrison in Gelkmaros.

string.body: Frozen Agrint[pl:"Agrints"];Appears near the 121st, 122nd, 123rd, 124th, 125th and 126th Garrison in Lakrum.

string.body: Frozen Agrint[pl:"Agrints"];Appears at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_A3] in Red Katalam (North) and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E4].

string.body: Winter Agrint[pl:"Agrints"];Appears at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_B9] in Red Katalam (North).

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_CheerUp_F4_GhostElim_L
string.body: Alrunta;An Elim whose home was destroyed. Only his soul remains. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP] during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_CheerUp_F4_GhostElim_D
string.body: Alrunta;An Elim whose home was destroyed. Only his soul remains. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_OP] during the event period.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF4_B4_DrakanWorker_all
string.body: Drana Farmer;The Dracuni in Inggison who grow Drana at the Mephistis Farm. Includes the 54th Dracuni Henchmen, the Raging 54th Dracuni Henchmen, the 54th Dracuni Healers and the Raging 54th Dracuni Healers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_01
string.body: Henchinerk;He looks very similar to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_03], but he's the most muscular of the Shugo suppliers and loves to show it. He is really nimble so he goes unnoticed.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02
string.body: Bliss Box[pl:"Boxes"];A gift box for Shugo's Lucky Day. Take it to [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_04] or [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_05], who will show you their gratitude.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_03
string.body: Tuffinerk;Without him, Santa would never manage to distribute the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02] on time. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2_Under] of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4] or in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A1] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_04
string.body: Wonnerinerk;Appears when your faction captures a garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4]. During the Shugo's Lucky Day event period, he'll happily give you a gift for each [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02]. Rumours are going around about embezzled [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02], so don't just trust any old Shugo!

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_05
string.body: Wonnirunerk;Appears when your faction captures a garrison in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4]. During the Shugo's Lucky Day event period, he'll happily give you a gift for each [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02]. Rumours are going around about embezzled [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02], so don't just trust any old Shugo!

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_06
string.body: Shugo Thug[pl:"Thugs"];They rob [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_04] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_05]. Hogs every [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02] under the Shugos' noses and camouflages themselves so well that you can't tell them apart from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_04] or [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_05]. If you throw an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_07] at them, you will receive a sweet [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_08].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_07
string.body: Icy Shower[pl:"Showers"];It was discarded by a fleeing Shugo Thug and is surrounded by a bitter touch of frost. According to a Shugo sage, Daevas once went hunting for a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_06] and managed to turn him into a statue made of ice with a single [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_07].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_08
string.body: Meluna[pl:"Melunes"];Shugo Thugs love to eat these little fruits morning, noon and night because they remind them a little fruit from warmer lands. You can use it to mix up punch for a banquet – the only trouble is that it summons monsters in the Legion Banquet Hall. It takes 10 Melunes to make a punch. You also need a Shaker Bundle.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_09
string.body: Blissephone;If [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_09] appears on the screen then it's over with the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_02]. There's a light in her imploring eyes that seems to darken the room.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_XL_Base
string.body: Ara Maior;A gigantic altar to Apsu has been erected at this site, the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5032].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_5032_Mistoff_Q_Guard_All
string.body: Snuwa Scout Troop of the 12th Altar;A Scout Troop that is attempting to recapture the altar. Appears near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5032]when it is occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF8_XLbase_D2_All
string.body: Obstructive Snuwa;The Snuwa from the volcanic region who are interfering with the Stella Corporation's research. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5032].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_10
string.body: Bellstride;He only had a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_06] for a short while, but he's already frozen. Hurl an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_07] at a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Event_HappyShugoDay_06] to get it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_STR_DF3_SZ_E2
string.body: The Whispering Forest;A forest in the northeast of Beluslan. There's often very thick fog here and ghosts even roam the place.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_STR_DF3_SZ_E3
string.body: Anair Ice Lake;A frozen lake to the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_E4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF4_Airport_Pandora_L_01
string.body: Strigik Village;A Strigik settlement in north-east Gelkmaros.
